subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jack Johnson scored two goals as the United States defeated Latvia, 4-2, in an opening-round game at the world championships in Bern, Switzerland. Drew Stafford and Patrick O’Sullivan also scored for the sixth-ranked Americans. Robert Esche stopped 18 shots for the United States.
